title: Microsoft Edge Multiple Vulnerabilities
description:
Multiple vulnerabilities were identified in Microsoft Edge. A remote attacker could exploit some of these vulnerabilities to trigger remote code execution on the targeted system. Impact
  • Remote Code Execution

title: Microsoft, OpenAI reach non-binding deal to allow OpenAI to restructure
MS Expat: Linux is 50 man-years away from world domination. - Slashdot
description: After 10 years at Microsoft with less than "10 minutes with any Open Source code till I left Microsoft-which is actually very typical for MS employees.", this expat left Microsoft and spent a year using Linux (mostly Umbutu). It was a bit of a shock. To be p…

title: Oracle's blockbuster surge shows AI trade's growing influence on market
description: Oracle shares jumped 36% on Wednesday after the company pointed to a demand surge from AI firms for its cloud services. The surge lifted its market value to $922 billion, leapfrogging the values of Eli Lilly LLY.N, JPMorgan Chase JPM.N and Walmart WMT.N.
